alert.note: Alert for North Central Mountains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 12 at 5:48AM MDT until June 13 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 8 PM MDT TODAY FOR NORTHEAST AND EAST CENTRAL NEW MEXICO DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, NEAR RECORD HEAT, AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MONDAY FOR ALL OF NORTHERN AND CENTRAL NEW MEXICO DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... .An upper level trough will approach from the west today and allow southwest winds to increase across parts of northern New Mexico. The combination of strong winds with very low humidity, near record heat, and an unstable airmass will generate critical fire weather conditions. Winds will continue to strengthen across the area Monday, and with very low humidity and well above normal temperatures, critical fire weather conditions will become more widespread across northern and eastern New Mexico. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY... The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a Red Flag Warning...which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Monday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AREA AND TIMING...Northwest Plateau, North Central Mountains, Northwest Highlands, Sandia, Manzano and Gallinas Mountains Monday afternoon through early evening. * 20 FOOT WINDS...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph Monday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...6 to 11 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: North Central Mountains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains
